languages.text: "Если Эксплораторы смогут запустить Горнило, то заберут его. А иначе пусть проваливают".
"If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."
languages.original_text: "Если Эксплораторы смогут запустить Горнило, то заберут его. А иначе пусть проваливают".

traits.locale_text: "If the Explorators will make Crucible start up, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise they can get lost."
"If the Explorators will make Crucible start up, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise they can get lost."
"If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."
"If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."
"If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."
"If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

languages.text: “如果开拓者可以启动熔炉，那他们就可以将其占为己有，否则他们只能离开。”
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

traits.locale_text: “如果开拓者可以启动熔炉，那他们就可以将其占为己有，否则他们只能离开。”

languages.text: «Si los Exploradores ponen en marcha el Crisol, lo tomarán para ellos. Si no, que se vayan».
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

traits.locale_text: «Si los Exploradores ponen en marcha el Crisol, lo tomarán para ellos. Si no, que se vayan».

languages.text: 「エクスプロレイターが坩堝を起動すれば、自分たちのものにするだろう。そうでなければ、彼らは立ち去るはずだ」
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスプロレイターが坩堝を起動すれば、自分たちのものにするだろう。そうでなければ、彼らは立ち去るはずだ」

languages.text: « Si les Explorators parviennent à activer le Creuset, ils pourront se l'approprier. Dans le cas contraire, ils devront se retirer. »
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

traits.locale_text: « Si les Explorators parviennent à activer le Creuset, ils pourront se l'approprier. Dans le cas contraire, ils devront se retirer. »

languages.text: "Wenn die Exploratoren den Tiegel starten, dann behalten sie ihn für sich. Ansonsten sollten sie gehen."
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Exploratoren den Tiegel starten, dann behalten sie ihn für sich. Ansonsten sollten sie gehen."

languages.text: "Keşiftörler, Pota'yı başlatabilirse onun sahipliğini üstlenebilir. Aksi takdirde buradan ayrılmalılar."
languages.original_text: "If the Explorators start the Crucible, then they will take it for themselves. Otherwise, they should leave."
